Well... (spoilering for others who have not seen the episode yet.)

[spoiler]Winter wrap up is coming and Rainbow dash is excited about her and Tanks first winter together, however, Tank is getting ready to hibernate through the season. Rainbow Dash does not like it one bit and tries to stop winter wrap up from happening so Tank doesn't have to hibernate.[/spoiler]
If you want more, go watch the episode.
